0:
[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
bad ingress config - nginx config test failed
ssl certificate(s) will expire in less then a week
uninstall the latest ingress changes to allow config reloads to resume
renew expiring certificates to avoid downtime
More than 35% of all requests returned 5XX, this requires your attention

dn: ${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
dc: tinfoilforest
o: Tinfoilforest
objectclass: top
objectclass: dcObject
objectclass: organization

dn: ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: people

dn: ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
objectClass: organizationalUnit
ou: groups

dn: cn=ben,ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
gidNumber: 8742
objectclass: top
objectclass: posixGroup

dn: uid=ben,ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ben
givenName: Ben
sn: ben
uid: ben
uidNumber: 8742
gidNumber: 8742
homeDirectory: /home/ben
loginShell: /bin/bash
mail: "${SECRET_ADMIN_EMAIL}"
objectClass: top
objectClass: inetOrgPerson
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
userPassword: {SSHA}x

dn: cn=ness,ou=groups,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ness
gidNumber: 8743
objectclass: top
objectclass: posixGroup

dn: uid=ness,ou=people,${SECRET_LDAP_BASE_DN}
cn: ness
givenName: ness
sn: ness
uid: ness
uidNumber: 8743
gidNumber: 8743
homeDirectory: /home/ness
loginShell: /bin/bash
mail: ${SECRET_PARTNER_EMAIL}
objectClass: top
objectClass: inetOrgPerson
objectClass: posixAccount
objectClass: shadowAccount
userPassword: {SSHA}x

[OUTPUT]
    Name http
    Match kube.*
    Host {{ .Release.Name }}-victoria-logs-single-server
    port 9428
    compress gzip
    uri /insert/jsonline?_stream_fields=stream,kubernetes_pod_name&_msg_field=log&_time_field=date
    format json_lines
    json_date_format iso8601
    header AccountID 0
    header ProjectID 0

[FILTER]
    Name kubernetes
    Match kube.*
    Merge_Log On
    Keep_Log On
    K8S-Logging.Parser On
    K8S-Logging.Exclude On
[FILTER]
    Name                nest
    Match               *
    Wildcard            pod_name
    Operation lift
    Nested_under kubernetes
    Add_prefix   kubernetes_
